content: /=A memory enters your mind: You've spoken with this Serpent once before. =/

content.option: "You should not be here, so nothing is yours."
"And how can I give it back?"

content: /=Another shudder.=/
/=Everything shakes violently.=/
[juno] "A mistake was made, but this is not your time."
[juno] "And allow you to destroy all that lives? To what end?"
[juno] "And if I kept you from it long enough, would you starve?"
[juno] "And so must you. The others with me will find a way to stop you."
[juno] "I feel it too. We are /=both=/ dying!"
[juno] "Then the outcome is the same. There must be another way."
[juno] "Vănek di sím joķull..."
[juno] "Would you be able to stop what is coming?"
/=You blink, and the Serpent catches your hesitation.=/
[juno] "You've been hunting me."
/=A terrible pain rips through you both.=/
/=The Serpent hisses. There's a flash of light.=/
[serpent] "Besides, if you truly desire the same as me, release your grip on that which currently sustains you."
[serpent] "Bringing gods back to life would be easier. You must have a weakness."
[serpent] "Each breath of yours is mine. Your every step is fueled by power created for me."
[serpent] "False. I am created by a god to become a god. It is /=you =/who should no longer be here."
[serpent] "Have I become so pathetic I cannot even consume /=you=/?"
[serpent] "I know of no other way. Everything I seek is just behind your thin shell of flesh, yet something keeps me from it."
[serpent juno] "So, there is one you cannot control. He would be my salvation, but..."
[serpent] "No satisfaction in mutual destruction. Impatience has undone me. Frustrating to learn a solution too late."
[serpent] "Such arrogance. I consume what parts of this world I can, but your use of a power that is rightfully mine is no longer tolerable."
[serpent] "The others? Could they be your end as well? But you can control them all."
[serpent] "This is my only time. Because of you."
[serpent] "To /=the =/end. Just as this world started, so must it cease. All things have an end."
[serpent] "When what I need is now within me? I only need to dissolve your grasp to wrest control. You must weaken."
[serpent] "You repelled my attacks but managed to die in your own ways. Yet you maintain a grip on my power. Absorbing you as a meal makes sense."
[serpent] "Your schemes are insignificant. Would you humor a gnat's requests?"
[serpent] "You speak of the dark tide. Yes, I would stop it for I will consume it and everything."
[serpent] "You stole it. You must know how to unsteal it. But would you willingly return what you've taken? Doubtful."
{skip} mark1=serpent mark2=juno
/=The space shakes horribly one last time.=/
/=The space shudders again.=/
/=The two of you shriek simultaneously, and your vision dims.=/
